meta.name: client-registration-error-registry
meta.description: Canonical error codes for OAuth client registration

registration.invalid_request.description: The registration request is structurally invalid or internally inconsistent.

registration.secret_generation_failed.description: The client secret could not be generated.

registration.secret_hashing_failed.description: The client secret could not be securely hashed.

registration.persistence_failed.description: The client could not be persisted to storage.

registration.audit_log_failed.description: Audit logging failed during client registration.

registration.unsupported_configuration.description: The requested client configuration is not supported by this server.
